biocontainers.name: metalign
biocontainers.summary: Metalign: efficient alignment-based metagenomic profiling via containment min hash

biotools.summary:
Efficient alignment-based metagenomic profiling via containment min hash.

Metalign is a method for estimating the taxonomic composition and relative abundances of organisms in a metagenomic sample based on whole-genome shotgun sequencing reads.

bioschemas.name: Metalign
bioschemas.summary:
Efficient alignment-based metagenomic profiling via containment min hash.

Metalign is a method for estimating the taxonomic composition and relative abundances of organisms in a metagenomic sample based on whole-genome shotgun sequencing reads.
